title: The Silent Patient
description: A psychological thriller about a woman's act of violence against her husband and her subsequent silence.
author: Alex Michaelides

title: Educated
description: A memoir about a woman's quest for knowledge, growing up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho.
author: Tara Westover

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: A coming-of-age story intertwined with a murder mystery set in the marshes of North Carolina.
author: Delia Owens

title: The Vanishing Half
description: A multi-generational narrative about twin sisters whose lives diverge when one decides to pass as white.
author: Brit Bennett

title: The Midnight Library
description: A novel about a woman who discovers a library between life and death that allows her to explore different versions of her life.
author: Matt Haig

title: The Great Alone
description: A powerful story of survival set in the Alaskan wilderness, focusing on a family facing personal and external challenges.
author: Kristin Hannah

title: Anxious People
description: A poignant and humorous story about a bank robbery gone wrong and the people who find themselves held hostage.
author: Fredrik Backman

title: The Testaments
description: A sequel to The Handmaid's Tale, revealing the inner workings of Gilead through the eyes of three women.
author: Margaret Atwood

title: Circe
description: A retelling of the story of Circe, a figure from Greek mythology, exploring themes of power and independence.
author: Madeline Miller

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
description: A story about a young woman who makes a Faustian bargain to live forever but is forgotten by everyone she meets.
author: V.E. Schwab

title: The Song of Achilles
description: A retelling of the Iliad from the perspective of Patroclus, exploring his relationship with Achilles.
author: Madeline Miller

title: The Overstory
description: A sweeping narrative about the relationship between humans and trees, intertwining the lives of various characters.
author: Richard Powers

title: Becoming
description: A memoir by Michelle Obama, chronicling her life from childhood to her time as First Lady of the United States.
author: Michelle Obama

title: Normal People
description: A story about the complex relationship between two Irish teenagers as they navigate adulthood.
author: Sally Rooney

title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
description: A whimsical fantasy about a caseworker who is assigned to a magical orphanage.
author: TJ Klune

title: Daisy Jones & The Six
description: A fictional oral history of a 1970s rock band and their rise to fame.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

title: Little Fires Everywhere
description: A tale of two families in suburban Ohio, exploring issues of race, privilege, and motherhood.
author: Celeste Ng

title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
description: A self-help book that outlines seven principles for personal and professional effectiveness.
author: Stephen R. Covey

title: The Power of Habit
description: An exploration of the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed.
author: Charles Duhigg

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: A thought-provoking exploration of the history of humankind from the Stone Age to the present.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

title: The Book Thief
description: A novel narrated by Death, telling the story of a young girl in Nazi Germany who finds solace in stealing books.
author: Markus Zusak

title: It Ends with Us
description: A romantic drama that explores the complexities of love and relationships.
author: Colleen Hoover

title: The Girl on the Train
description: A psychological thriller about an woman who becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation.
author: Paula Hawkins

title: The Night Circus
description: A fantasy novel about a magical competition between two young illusionists.
author: Erin Morgenstern

title: The Light We Lost
description: A love story that follows the lives of two people over the years, exploring choices and consequences.
author: Jill Santopolo

title: A Man Called Ove
description: A heartwarming story about a curmudgeonly old man whose life changes when a lively family moves in next door.
author: Fredrik Backman

title: The Giver of Stars
description: A historical novel about a group of women who become part of a traveling library in Depression-era Kentucky.
author: Jojo Moyes

title: The Hating Game
description: A romantic comedy about two office coworkers who find themselves in a battle of wills.
author: Sally Thorne

title: The Rosie Project
description: A romantic comedy about a genetics professor who devises a scientific survey to find the perfect wife.
author: Graeme Simsion

title: Big Little Lies
description: A darkly comic take on domestic violence, friendship, and parenting.
author: Liane Moriarty

title: Before the Fall
description: A suspenseful thriller about a plane crash and the lives of those involved.
author: Noah Hawley

title: The Witch Elm
description: A psychological thriller about a man whose life unravels after a tragic event and a murder investigation.
author: Tana French

title: The Chain
description: A gripping thriller about a mother whose child is kidnapped, and she must kidnap another child to save her own.
author: Adrian McKinty

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: A historical fiction novel about a reclusive Hollywood icon recounting her glamorous and scandalous life.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

title: The Beautiful World, Where Are You?
description: A story about two friends navigating life and relationships in modern-day Ireland.
author: Sally Rooney

title: The Glass Hotel
description: A multi-layered narrative about a woman's disappearance and the interconnected lives surrounding her.
author: Emily St. John Mandel

title: Crying in H Mart
description: A memoir about a young woman's relationship with her mother and her Korean American identity.
author: Michelle Zauner

title: Finding Freedom
description: An intimate and heartfelt biography of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.
author: Omid Scobie and Carolyn Durand

title: The Henna Artist
description: A historical novel set in post-independence India, focusing on a woman's struggle for independence.
author: Alka Joshi

title: Malibu Rising
description: A story about four famous siblings and their lives, culminating in a party that will change everything.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

title: The City We Became
description: A fantastical tale in which New York City is personified and must defend itself from an otherworldly threat.
author: N.K. Jemisin

title: The Last Thing He Told Me
description: A suspenseful novel about a woman whose husband disappears, leaving her a mysterious note.
author: Laura Dave

title: Project Hail Mary
description: A science fiction novel about a lone astronaut on a mission to save humanity.
author: Andy Weir

title: The Martian
description: A gripping tale of an astronaut stranded on Mars and his struggle for survival.
author: Andy Weir

title: The Nightingale
description: A historical fiction novel about two sisters in France during World War II and their struggle to survive.
author: Kristin Hannah

title: The Book of Lost Names
description: A historical novel about a young woman who forges identity documents for Jewish children during World War II.
author: Kristin Harmel

title: The Island of Sea Women
description: A historical novel about the female divers of Jeju Island and their friendships over the decades.
author: Lisa See

title: Ghosts of Harvard
description: A psychological thriller about a young woman who believes her brother's ghost is haunting her at Harvard.
author: Kate Elizabeth Russell

title: The Invisible Man
description: A gripping retelling of the classic horror story about a scientist who discovers how to become invisible.
author: H.G. Wells

title: The Dutch House
description: A story about a brother and sister who are exiled from their childhood home and how it shapes their lives.
author: Ann Patchett
